title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bonuses on Hotring Circuit Races and More
content:
Earn 2X GTA$ and 4X RP as you race alongside other adrenaline-addicted lunatics jostling for position in Hotring Circuit Races. Discover the Hotring Circuit in the Stunt Races area of the Jobs list in the Pause Menu, or by joining the San Andreas Super Sport Series from your in-game map or phone.

In Rhino Hunt, the mighty Goliath of the Rhino tank is outnumbered by a team of wily Davids armed with Sticky Bombs, with both sides gunning for 2X GTA$ and RP this week.
